I use essential oil for many applications, I especially enjoy using Aromatherapy Ultrasonic Diffuser with a few drops of my favorite essential oil.  Since I am reviewing ‘Diffuser’, I will write what I like about this Anypro 200SL.I bought Aromatherapy Diffuser at least a dozen of them in the past.  Because of it, I know what to look for when it comes to Ultrasonic Aromatherapy Diffuser.  It comes in various sizes and prices; some are good and some aren’t even worth a penny.  I have several diffusers at home in different rooms and I use it all the time.  So, I hope my review can help someone looking to buy Essential Oil Diffuser for Aromatherapy.• Diffuser Time Control:This feature makes Anypro’s Aromatheraphy Diffuser exceptional.  It has one button to control how long I want it to diffuse the mist.  It has the settings to select diffusing operation time to 1 hour, 2 hours or 3 hours.  Most other diffuser on the markets usually diffuses continuously until there is no more water left in the tank.  Some of  one that has control, it doesn’t usually given a choice to select how long I want it to diffuse, rather, diffusers work like xx seconds on and xx seconds off continuously until tank is empty and this kind of diffuser is more expensive than the one that doesn’t control.• Price:This Anypro Aromatheraphy Diffuser is just under $30.00.  It has everything you want in Ultrasonic Aromatheraphy Diffuser.  So, in my opinion, this is very reasonably priced.  I bought small diffuser not too long ago and paid $49.00. I bought it because of the shape/design of the diffuser and it matches the guest bedroom’s décor.  It was clearly not a smart reason to buy a diffuser.• Installation/Assembly:Anypro’s Diffuser does not require assembly.  - Out of the box and ready to go!  Some of diffuser I bought before require assembly that came with poorly written manuals. I remembered one particular diffuser, there was very small coil spring part that I must place in order to diffuse, which it didn’t mentioned in the manual. I only able to figure it out only after several hours working to put the unit together.So, I was happy to see Anypro’s diffuser came without multiple pieces that I have to figure it out before I can start using it.• Setup:Just add a water into a reservoir with a few drops of my favorite essential oil and it’s ready to diffuse.• Water Level ControlThis is very nice feature.  When water level in reservoir, it shut off automatically. Many diffusers in the market will not diffuse without the water, yet, unit is still on. Which cuts service life of the diffuser.• Holding water capacity is 200ML200ML is a lots of water for diffuser.  It will last pretty much all night (if you are like me, I always turn my diffuser on at night before I go to bed).  I’ve used diffuser that doesn’t hold much water and it only last couple of hours.Even during the day, I use diffuser and constantly adding water isn’t always convenient, so 200ML holding capacity tank is very nice to have.• Inside water tank has smooth surface. Sometimes essential oil left inside of water tank that require through cleaning.  This diffuser's Inside water holding tank is very smooth and nothing in the way, so cleaning will be effortless.• Humidifying effectLight misting from this diffuser humidifies the room.  This I don’t like using regular humidifier. But Ultrasonic Diffuser add just right humidity to the room.• Very quiet machine.This diffuser is very quiet. I received discount coupon to purchase this item in exchange for my unbiased review.When it comes to double sided tape, I have not yet found strong glue sticky enough to hold the item if item weights little heavy.  So, when I test this tape, I was very happy to see this is strong enough to  hold many items that I need for double sided tape to hold up on the wall.I have wind protecting foam tapes around my front door. The foam came already with self adhesive glue.  However, every time season changes, I ended up replacing it because of cold and hot weather between the season changes, it never hold more than few months without falling down.  Sometimes, it start to come down during installation.When I receive this tape, I immediately use it to place foam weather strip around the door. It's starting to get cold now already, so this is perfect timing to take care of weather strip. Weather strip was little bit smaller than this tape, but where it needs to install, little wider double sided tape actually worked better and perfect fit!  After I install, I tried to pull it down and see if it will come off easily, but I couldn't pull it down without tearing the foam.  So, I know this is sticky and it will stay on.  I love this tape and price is excellent.  I couldn't get double sided, strong tape at the store without paying 2x more for shorter length.This is SUPER STICKY double-sided tape and I want to mentioned couple of helpful Note on how I used this tape successfully.  Taking time to do this is the key:*  When cutting the foam,  new, sharp razor-blade type works the best. - DO NOT USE SCISSORS!  If you use scissors, sticky foam will stick to the scissors and  you'll have big mess on your hand.* Attaching/installation item A to item B -  It's best to cut the foam to the length of Item A first.  Then, match up the Item A to foam that you just cut.  Now, start peeling  off the waxy paper on the backside of this foam tape as you attach it to Item A.  You need to do this little length at a time and make sure to  line up Item A and the tape to stay straight  No matter what types of method you use to apply this double sided tape, DO NOT peel waxy paper on the foam all the way at once.  This tape is light weight and it doesn't hang down easily, thus, if you peel waxy paper from the foam, you'll have hard time keeping it straight.* Once you have Item A and this double sided foam tape together, do the same method mentioned above...  (little length at a time)  and apply Item A (now double sided foam tape is on) to the Item B.

Ok, I feel a little jibbed here.  The one I received didn't come with a little wrist band and it was $1 more expensive and I definitely didn't 6 different choices in color. I've used face cleansing systems before but they were never waterproof.  So when I found this one by ESS, I decided to do a little digging to see if there are others that are better.  After much research, I chose ESS.What puts ESS above the other waterproof systems I researched is the ability to easily replace the brushes at a reasonable price.  That's the biggest expense of cleansing systems.  It's not so much the system in itself, it's the brushes.  Good brushes that's easily replaceable is the key.  The ESS brushes are fantastic.  My favorite is the body brush, it sounds kind of extreme to have such a large brush but it's fantastic!  I use it primarily on my knees, elbows, and foot.  The roughest spots on my body have never felt so soft.  Also I was doubtful it was strong enough to clear away spots on my skin that are prone to ingrown hair ... but it does!The pumice stone head is also great.  Now the other two are tougher to tell apart since they look identical at first.  But I've been using the softer one with more bristles as my face cleanser brush in the shower.  It's gentle enough for face and neck and it really helps the expensive face washes I use to get deeper into the pores.The other one that has less bristles is the exfoliation brush.  I have yet to use it.  But I'm sure it's just a matter of time before I get to it.The ESS system also spins, not like some others that just vibrates.  This system is a spinning system, waterproof, with easily replaceable brushes.  The handle and weight of the brush system is also just right.  Not too heavy, not to light, with an easy grip to hold without it slipping away in the shower.The original system is very affordable and the customer service is always there to support you.  What's not to love?

I've tried Liporidex PM and Plus.  I still prefer Liporidex PM as it does not contain any caffeine.  It takes about a month for the formula to work.  I had to take it consistently for one month before I saw any results.  But once it kicks in, I do start losing the weight.  Am I going to drop 10 pounds over night?  I wish.  I have a lot of pounds to lose after the second kid.One thing I learned about weight loss is the plateau.  There's a certain plateau I reach when I start working out.  I'm sure if I increased the workout regime, I would lose more.  But time is a constraint.  This is where Liporidex PM helsp me.  I started only taking it at night, which helped me shed a few more pounds.  Then I started taking in the day time.  That really helped some more.Does this mean I can go on a buffet binge?  No.  I still have to watch what I eat.  But at least this helped me get past my plateau.  Not feeling like a hungry all the time helps too.  I'm able to shed more pounds, slowly but steadily.  It makes me feel even better when others have noticed my weight loss and have asked me what I'm taking.  They're surprised something so easy works.Lastly, when I told my husband I'm taking these pills, he asked me to stop because he doesn't trust any diet pills.  My scientist husband reads all the ingredients before I take any pills.  He gave me the thumbs up on this PM formula.  Surprised?  Me too.

The PA system is really nice.  Not an issue.  But if you were looking into this particular model with the throat mic, then I recommend saving your money and buy the Audio2000 unit without one.  The throat mic doesn't pick up audio as well as the standard mics that comes with this system.  Also your neck needs to be a certain size for this to even remain on while talking.  For me, the throat mic is too big.  I had to secure it in other ways and my voice sounded like I came down with  a cold.  Compared to the other mics that comes with this system, to pay extra for the throat mic is not a worthwhile investment.  Otherwise than that, I really love this PA system.  Simple, easy to use.  The only obstacle now is I need to find a cushion for the headset mic to keep the top of my ears from feeling the pressure from the steel headset.

I'm new to Xia Hu's work.  But I have to say this song is amazing!  It gets better and better as the song continues.  So glad Amazon carries music like this.
I'm new to Xia Hu's work.  But I have to say this song is beautiful!  His voice is so mature and heart-warming.  It reminds me of the Jackie Cheung days.  So glad Amazon carries music like this.
I'm new to Xia Hu's work.  But I have to say this song is beautiful!  Lovely lovely love song!  So glad Amazon carries music like this.
I've always loved Martina McBride's voice. Her rendition of The Christmas Song is classic and lovely. It really gets me into the holiday mood.

This shoe rack is sturdy, easy to assemble, and it really fits in a small closet with room to spare.  I was really skeptical that this would fit men's shoes (size 10) but it does.  It really has helped me re-organize my small coat closet.

This is my favorite rendition of "Let It Snow".  Lady Antebellum's got the perfect voices, perfect tempo. and the violin part is so upbeat and lovely!  I just need a cup of hot chocolate to go with this song.

It was hard to find a "We Wish You a Merry Christmas" with the correct lyrics from the olden days.  But we needed it so our toddler can listen and practice with it before her preschool's Christmas play.  This was the line we needed"Good tidings to you, wherever you are"It's a very minor line but we felt that it was necessary to help her drill it in for the school play.  Plus it's the Chipmunks!  She loved singing along with them too.
I've been a fan of Clay Aiken for a long time.  His rendition of Winter Wonderland is perfect to my Christmas song collection.  It has just the right happy uplifting beat.
I've always loved Martina McBride's voice.  Her rendition of Silent Night is classic and lovely.  It really gets me into the holiday mood.
Purchased this as a birthday gag gift.  It worked.  Everyone laughed.  It's not an every day hat.  It's somewhat on the small side.  It is well constructed.  For a birthday gag gift it's perfect.

Silver Bells is a classic and it's hard to find an artist with the right voice and right melody  Katharine McPhee's version is absolutely heart-warming and beautiful.  I had no idea she was an American Idol contestant until after I purchased this song.  Based on the album cover I thought she was a singer from the olden days ... like the Carpenters.  Her voice just has that kind of feel to it.

I've purchased this bottle about 3 times on Amazon and it seems to work.  I don't know why it would but it does.  My 4 year old loves this because it tastes like water.  I give her 3 sprays each time, instead of the 2 recommended on the back and it takes care of her cough quickly.  I thought it was a placebo affect and didn't give it to my daughter one time she had the cold.  She coughed much longer.  So I make sure to give it to her from now on whenever I hear a cough coming.

I purchased these based on the great reviews on Amazon.  When I received the burp clothes they were great.  Small but very absorbent.  Then after a few washes, the threads started showing.  After I cut the loose threads, and wash them some more, it's falling apart more.  I don't even bother cutting the threads anymore.Burp clothes must be able to handle constant washings and these do not hold up.  I'm very disappointed.  In addition, they were already small to begin with and now they shrink some more.  With the loose threads and the shrinkage, I won't have much to work with anymore.  Considering they were $10 for something that lasted a month, it's not worth the money.My friend ended up recommending burp clothes by Ikea.  I purchased a few and they were double the size of the Dundee Burp Clothes and are just as absorbent.

There is something weird with the pricing of this cable version when the 6inch model costs more than the 4ft model. On the other hand, this is a quality cable, I tested it and it works with iPhones 5S, 6 and 6Plus without any hint of trouble. I like the fact that the gold model matches very well with the gold iPhone models - the 6inch version is very useful to use with an external battery pack in keeping cable clutter to a minimum in your pocket. The cable is much more solid looking and feeling than the standard iPhone cables, yet it still fits and works well with all the very skinny and tight cases I found on the various iPhone models in my home. I like it because it is a quality cable, but pricing wise it is not a great value - this is closer to Monster Cable style pricing.

Once upon a time there used to be just one version of Dreft and that is what we used for the baby until he could start crawling, and then we switched to regular and much cheaper detergents. This Stage 2 formula I think is an attempt to capture that market of people who are quick to switch to regular detergents for toddler laundry needs. This claims to be better on food stains, but I am not sure what the reference for "better" is - it certainly doesn't appear to be making a noticeable difference vs the regular Dreft detergent; at any rate nowhere near close to results one can get from Tide Ultra or other top rated products. This version appears to be more concentrated than regular Dreft, as the doses are much smaller for a regular load of laundry. I found the scent to be pretty much the same diaper clean scent, only more powerful; no matter where you have the laundry room in your house, the whole house will know when you do a load of this. I know it is hard to evaluate a detergent effectiveness objectively, but for me this one doesn't stand out either in results or value; a middling performance at premium prices make for a tough sell.

Kind of poor quality or poorly made; the on/off button doesn't work smoothly and my kid has to struggle a big to push it to turn it on or off. Even more, while doing that he managed to get it broken inide a quick 2 days of play. Now the button won't do anything and it seems stuck on "on".

It is cool to have a magnifying glass, however for a toy designed for kids and the way kids abuse toys this scratches too easily. The magnification power is also kind of weak - kids prefer immediate big effects and the 4x magnification max afforded by this is not very satisfying to my first grader.

I used this mount for a slim (2"  thick) NVR recorder and it works out great. The pictures are always showing the brackets with some device being held, so naturally I expected to get quite a bit of heft and metal in the package when I ordered. When it arrived it was very compactly packed, to the point where I had to check that all six bracket parts are included in the shrink plastic. The assembly is very easy, the mounting was simple and if you happen to find a stud for one or two of the mounting holes then you can hang quite a bit of weight on this. This is a great design because it allows the units to circulate air and ventilate according to their specs. In all I am hanging about 16lbs from this bracket (NVR, power brick switch and power brick) and I don't have the slightest worry about having my equipment stick to the wall like I installed it for the long run.

I love the format of these books. They are very easy to handle by the first graders, the text is a very abridged and simplified version of the real tale, but it works out right for the beginner level. The book has a total of about 40 pages, one page half text in larger print and a picture page, making it easy for the kids to follow the story along. It is a great format and a great choice for building the kids' first book collection.The fairy tales are a good collection for the ones kids need to know in first grade, but I would recommend getting additional volumes from this collection - my kids love reading and being read to from these books

The book has a total of about 40 pages, one page half text in larger print and a picture page, making it easy for the kids to follow the story along. It is a great format and a great choice for building the kids' first book collection.

The book has a total of about 40 pages, one page half text in larger print and a picture page, making it easy for the kids to follow the story along. It is a great format and a great choice for building the kids' first book collection. This volume in particular ("the naked emperor") is my kids' favorite.
too short for securing bike wheels and the plastic/material is kind of thin.
good value, great quality. I use these to secure the bike wheels and hold stuff together on the bike rack to avoid movements and needless friction while in transport.

A great puzzle that can be "attacked" by a first grader without any help. Not too complex and not too simple - just right to keep his attention and keep him occupied for about an hour or so. The puzzle pieces are very well cut and fit very well together.
great quality, pieces are very well cut and fit well together, it takes a good 2-3 hours to put together.
a nice and funny story, but a lot of it is being told by the illustraton - the kids absolutely want to hold the book and look it over.
A favorite of my five year old, he keeps asking to get this read over and over and over.... Yeah, now he wants to build a robot like that.
Well made, looks good, a great time killer when you're in need of something like this. Moderately challenging for a 6 year old... Pieces are well cut and fit very well together.
A fine diversion from the classic game, greatly enjoyed by the kids contemporary with everything Dusty fad. My 5 year old likes it very much.

This bike top bar works quite well - the product is basically a tube within a tube which can glide and twist to various lengths. The tubes are held together shut with a very thin elastic band though, so I do have some worry about the longevity of the elastic long term.

I used this to replace a regular dimmer in my office because - well, I am lazy and I find that getting up from the chair to turn on the lights from the switch across the room to be a bothersome exercise. Installation and setup went fine for me and the switch works as advertised. The only problem I have is that it seems to be overly sensitive to the amount of light in the room on deciding whether to turn on the lights or not. I have dual screen monitors facing which project some light around the room, and if I have anything with a white background the lights will stay off pretty late into the evening, and switching away from a white background to the darker desktop will result in having the lights immediately come on - which  is kind of an unintended and weird "remote" effect.The occupancy sensor is kind of a miss for me. I do like to use the TruColor LEDs (using the TW series from Cree currently) and these seem to play games with the occupancy sensor. It does work most of the time as a motion sensor, but you do have to keep moving because if you just sit typing in front of a computer it will time out on you and turn off the lights. That does not happen if I switch to incandescent bulbs.

Funny bedtime material, my kid loves the rhymes and loves commenting on all the crazy ideas explored for building a better car. I love chatting with my kid about why and how everything would be or not a good idea; the rhymes of Chris Van Dusen are easy to like and memorize by my K kid.
A funny story with good rhyming, this keeps the kid entertained during the story time. He is in love with the rhymes and cadence of Chris Van Dusen books.
It is funny, it rhymes and my kid loves hearing this story again and again. This is the book that made me pursue and get everything else Chris Van Dusen has published for kids.

My kid loves the rhymes and the cadence of this story. This is also one of my favorite stories to read a bed time because the rhymes bring a lot of discussion and we end up chatting about 3-4 times longer than it would otherwise take to just read the book. A definite winner for the bedtime story time.

My kid loves the rhymes and the cadence of this story. This is also one of my favorite stories to read a bed time because the rhymes bring a lot of discussion and we end up chatting about 3-4 times longer than it would otherwise take to just read the book. A definite winner for the bedtime story time.
Seems to be very solid made; works well for sync and charging for both iPhones and Kindles.

The main advantage of this glider versus the more usual swing-type products seems to be (at least in my case0 that the bay tolerates it much better. because you don't have the centrifugal force which is present in a swing, the baby seems to actually enjoy the experience. The only indication in the packaging for the recommended maximum age is "don't use it with infants which are can crawl, although practically speaking at around 6 months or so this is becoming obsolete. The glider is smooth and works well; the speed selectors range from "nice" at the lowest setting to "don't use" for the medium to "no freaking way" at the high speed setting. The glide motion is fluid, but after about 3 weeks of use my unit has developed a slight jerking motion when it changes direction at the end of one run - I don't remember that being there when I first started to use it. As the baby gains in weight this will probably become more and more evident.The soother was very easy to assemble and all the soft materials are easy to take out for washing. The unit had a battery compartment for the music and nature sounds only; the gliding motion only works while plugged in. Overall I like it very much because my baby enjoys spending time in it, but I cannot give a full 5 stars because of the slight change in the fluidity of the glide when changing direction.

This USB meter works great, although I could do without the complexities of the single button multifunction single press/double press/long press interface. The display is led lit and it 9is highly visible, unlike the image they show in the photos. The device can store up to 10 readings in memory and it has a non-intuitive system of storing/recalling that memory through single and double presses of its singular "user interface" button. I really wish that button would simply reset the counters and be done, but that's not how it works. In fact I lost the little instructions flyer that came in the box, so now I just keep pressing random sequences until I get the counters reset to make a new measurement.

These arrived on time and they work great as a replacement for the original tubes from the Jeep Liberty stroller. There are variants with straight or angled valves - and the ones with the angled valves make it much easier to operate and pump air in the wheel.

There are 3 frying pans (8/10/12 inch, without lids) and 4 pots (1.5, 2.5, 3 and 6 qt, with lids). I would have liked it if the frying pans would have had lids as well, or if the lid from the dutch oven would fit the 10 inch pan.The pots are well made, the thick material is a great conductor and retainer of heat. With the exception of the glass lids everything is oven safe to very high temperatures (550F). The glass lids should be good to about 350F. The handles are sturdy and I have found them to stay comfortably low temp during stove-top cooking. I have been putting these through daily use and the pots show no signs of wear and/or staining, which seem to indicate a very good quality stainless as well.I am decking a star from my rating because I would really like to have the lids interchangeable between the pots and pans - I would really like for the frying pans to have a lid cover option as well.

It doesn't take much handling and poking around to come to the conclusion that these are a quality and well engineered set of pliers. There is not the slightest amount of wobble, the handles are pretty much perfect to handle. The cutter is perfectly machined and aligned; the long pliers tips are again perfectly aligned and grip with a solid feeling which is sure to make these pliers last a long time. If you ever had the misfortune of handling one of the bargain-bin pliers from the big home improvement stores then you will really appreciate the step up in quality and workmanship of the IRWIN pliers.I also like the tool wrap they come in - that too is a quality item and it takes very little space in the tool box, while keeping all the pliers together. This is much preferred to the hard-shell cheapo cases which end up snapping and breaking at the first tumble off the table.

I got this bag because I thought it to be the most practical for a quick business one-two nights trip. Unlike so many other laptop overnighter bags, this one has a good sized compartment for clothing and you can easily pack two days worth of stuff. As far as the space is concerned, the bag is as close to ideal as possible. However, there are some poor design choices and it is surprising for a Samsonite bag of this price range:- the laptop compartment is lightly padded, but it has no straps to keep the laptop in, no pockets, nothing. It is ideally suited for carrying folders and papers, but if you have a smaller laptop it will bounce around freely in that compartment.- the smaller pocket in front of the bag only has zippers to about a third of the way down, so it doesn't really open more than 4-5 inches at the top when its zippers are "all the way open". That makes it really hard to operate inside and perform the "where the darn USB stick" search ritual.- the telescopic arm feels a bit flimsy - it is made out of five segments and it is choke-full of hard plastic parts which usually end up breaking over the repeated use. (It just happened to me on the previous Samsonite wheeled laptop bag I had, but that one was a cheaper model with a shorter warranty. That is why I decided to move to a premium line. Needless to say, I am disappointed to see that with today's Samsonite, more money does not buy you better quality)- the most disappointing of all, the zippers - more precisely, the pullers. These are made out of rubbery plastic with a metal paint. It doesn't take a well traveled person or a rocket scientist to know these won't last past a six month mark, if that. I don't understand why Samsonite would stoop so low and compromise on the quality of their zippers.Overall though this is a very practical wheeled bag for me, so I will keep it. Also, Samsonite offers a 10 year warranty on this, and sadly, based on the way this bag is made, it is very likely that warranty will come into play sooner rather than later.

This is a very strong magnetic holder. Mounting it is very easy if you know how to find your studs. Stud mounting is recommended - the magnets are quite strong on this unit, so it will take a bit of force to pry the tools off once they're attached.On the downsides of this, the bar has a bit of heft to it (feels a bit over two pounds) and it is kind of short at about 17". Also, because the wall mounting brackets are fixed, you cannot "extend" this bar with more of the same to make a longer magnetic line. This is an annoyance for me because I'd like to put a line of this magnetic strips on top of my pegboard wall....

This is truly a very good sounding speaker bar. I got this installed replacing a Samsung HW-H550 sound bar system to compare it and this does sound better. The subwoofer blends in better, it is harder to spot the moment when the subwoofer "takes over" from the speakers in the sound bar. The Samsung had a better and more expansive 3D effect, but that could very well be because in the Samsung I had the choice of feeding a digital signal through an HDMI port. In the Energy CS-30 there is no HDMI port, there is no coaxial port. There is an optical TOSlink port, but neither my TV or my receiver had the option of producing output on an optical link, so I could not test a digital signal.I found the sound up and down the range to be very well balanced. The lows are solid and the sub can and will shake your room if you crank it up. The trebles are light and very well articulated, not muffled like in the Samsung H550. Overall I have no complaints about the sound quality in my setup (other than the gimmicky 3D effects which I don't use anyway). This is a good sound, period, without having to add any meta-disclaimers like "for the price". The speech comes through clearly in the movies and the fact that the system can be used independently as a Bluetooth receiver makes it easy to play stuff from a tabled or phone without having to power on a whole bunch of additional equipment.One of the weak points of the system is the remote, which is too small and and has those lentil-sized buttons that are so annoying to press. Another one is that the sound bar and the subwoofer have to be powered off separately - I have the subwoofer placed in the back of the room to take advantage of its wireless nature, and when powering off the system I have to aim the little remote at both the soundbar and the sub separately. Another annoyance is the lack of an HDMI port, Some of its competitors have an HDMI pass-through capability which would make things much easier. Most receivers are already capable of decoding complex sound and feeding digital PCM through the output/monitor port - and HDMI cable would make getting a digital signal to the soundbar much easier.Overall though, I like this set and I will leave it on instead of the Samsung soundbar, even though this means I will forever keep obsessing over the fact that I am feeding my sound system through the old style RCA ports instead of using a digital signal.

These "literary works" are mind-bogglingly stupid, truly breathtakingly awful. These are chock-full of bad grammar, words you'd rather not hear a six year old use, attitudes which drive most well-adjusted parents up the nearest wall. As I flipped through the pages I kept imagining all the pauses I'd have to make while reading this to my kid ("well, Junie B does this, but we know it's not okay to [headbutt someone, use the word stupid, be disrespectful to teachers, etc]"). Every page would require such a detour and adjustment to make sure the kid gets the message one wants to deliver. And I don't know about other kids, but at least with my little once you give him a stupid idea (to use a word which shows up repeatedly in this series), it is really darn hard to get him not to act on it at some later time, no matter how much coaching goes with it. These books are filled to the brim with such bad ideas and attitudes. I am dumbfounded that these books are so popular in schools; but I'd  rather have my precious snowflake learn these bad things in school from other kids rather than enable him to be the instigator and *teach* bad behaviors to others in school. For one non-trivial thing, the former gets me fewer calls from the principal.

I liked this cover for my Voyage. It is very light and very well made. I like a cover for my Voyage because it brings back some of the feeling of holding something substantial in your hand as you read - I have found the Kindle Voyage by itself to be too light and too slippery. The only negatives for this cover are the fact that it is a tight fit when you insert the Kindle and that the magnetic wake function is not working. The last one is puzzling, as the front cover of the cover is using magnets to close and stay closed. It could be that my copy has the magnets misplaced and therefore they don't trigger the Kindle wake function.

I got this just in time for the rainy season in California and although I have only had it in use for about a month the results are great. the blade was very easy to install, and from the first use to now it is perfect at removing the water drops from the windshield. No squeaks, no skipping, just clean dry glass behind the blade as it is moving across the windshield. These are much, much better than the stock blades on my car which can be had fro about twice the price installed at the dealership. After a month of every day use in the mornings, plus some light day use on wet days, they don't show any signs of aging, no streaks, no diminished performance. These are going to be my brand gong forward.

This is a good quality pruner; despite its name it is really what one would expect to be a full size pruner. This arrived in time for my annual chopping down of the Christmas tree work - and if you ever needed to make a large tree fit into a very small "garden refuse" bin then you know that the resin put out by the pine tree branches will clog every pruner ever made. This one fared as best as one could hope for under the circumstances. The nonstick coating helps it through a large number of cuts, but eventually you do have to stop work and clean it because the pine resin doesn't seem to care about non-stickiness. It cuts through the thicker branches with relative ease and the blade stayed sharp through the end. Overall I liked it, but in the end it only matched the performance of my half-priced store-bought titanium non-stick blade pruner - I find it hard to justify the almost double price for this model.

This is a good model, but the instructions that come with it detailing the steps needed are horrible. The toy comes in its robot form and the instructions only cover the transformation steps from car to robot, so you have to work your way backwards from that to get to the car/truck form. Then there are the images themselves - they have been drawn by someone who has never seen a 3D perspective or is severely preception impaired. That is to say, as drawings they are 99% useless - they only help you by pointing the general area of a red blob where you'll need to concentrate your attention on to next.

This sleeve is well constructed of comfortable material. I have been able to wear it without it causing any increased sweating or itching of my hand and arm. It does give my wrist added stability, which aids in my daily tasks. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my review.

I purchased this Koozie for my 10 y.o. granddaughter and she absolutely loves the different colored lights. That detail gives it the Wow factor. I purchased hers at a discounted price in exchange for my review. She loves, and recommends it.

I am very impressed with the quality, appearance, and functionality of the iGT touch screen texting leather gloves. These are a huge upgrade to the synthetic fabric texting gloves I purchased in the past. They are so much nicer than the pictures shown in the listing. They are warm, buttery soft, function as described in the listing, and came beautifully packaged, making them perfect for gifting. They are perfect for a night out on the town, as well as business professionals.  I purchased mine at a discounted price, but that does not affect my review. I  absolutely love and recommend them! I do want to add that I had no problem with the sizing. I normally wear a size small, ordered the size small, and they fit perfectly. I'm glad I didn't order a size up.
These taste exactly like the marshmallows in Lucky Charms cereal. They're magically delicious!

I purchased Keraplex Organica Shampoo at a discounted price for review purposes. My daughter has always had extremely thick hair until the last few months. She has been under tremendous stress lately, resulting in hair loss by the handful! She has been using this shampoo since mid April, and we have seen great results. Her hair is thicker, shinier, and healthier now. But the real proof is that the bathtub drain hasn't been clogged by her hair in almost a month!!! I recommend this product. I do want to add that she has also started taking a multi-vitamin daily. I think the combination of the two has taken care of the hair loss problem.

I received my set of Chalk Markers By Colore at a discounted price for review purposes. I like that the set can be used with either a bullet or chisel tip because it allows my grand-daughter to be more creative with her artwork. The colors are beautiful and vibrant! The pen holder that came with our set is  a vibrant pink. I love the added bonus of the pen holder to keep the markers neatly stored when she's not using them. Clean-up is a breeze with these markers by simply using a damp sponge or towel. All in all, we are very pleased with this set. They have the grand-kid and Nana seal of approval! :)

This serum firms, plumps, evens, hydrates, lightens, and moisturizes my skin. It also shrinks my pores and I've noticed a huge improvement with my fine lines and wrinkles!  Plus, my skin feels so soft and is blemish free. I'm extremely happy with the results this serum has given. I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I'm pleased with this purchase.
I like that it's a key chain, and is small enough to fit  in my pocket or purse, or attach it to my keys! It's nice to know I will always have a charger with me.

As someone with dry, sensitive, mature skin, as well as sensitive eyes, this eye gel is perfect for me! It has a true gel consistency with a white opaque appearance. One pump is more than enough per application. I apply it every morning and evening. It goes on very smoothly, absorbs completely, and leaves no tacky or sticky residue behind. It has a light and fresh cucumber scent that dissipates quickly. This eye gel has lightened my dark circles, and given me a more youthful appearance by firming my skin. I look refreshed and rested with the puffiness gone. I love every Majestic Pure product I have used, and this eye gel is no exception. They seem to research their formulas very well before offering them to the public. I was very impressed by this particular product's ingredients. They included the ingredient, Resistem to this formula, which has been scientifically proven to activate our skin's defensive and protective mechanisms against aging-which means it actually is healing and repairing. It's first aid for my skin! It also contains Hyaluronic Acid which hydrates, moisturizes, and plumps our skin, giving it a dewy and youthful appearance. Matrixyl 3000 is added to help firm our skin. I received mine without charge in exchange for my truthful review, which I've definitely given. I absolutely love and recommend it!

There is truth to the old saying, "You are what you eat." Le Fair's Clear Acne supplement provides the nutrients that I need for healthy skin from the inside out. The ingredients include Pantothenic Acid, Thiamin, Riboflavin, Niacin, Vitamin B6, Folate, Vitamin B12, Biotin, and L-Carnitine. I love the idea of healing my skin from the inside out! I still use my topical skin care products in addition to this oral supplement, and the combination is working well. I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review.

These supplements make me feel more energetic without making me feel jittery. With my energy level up, hopefully I will be more active, in turn, helping me to lose a few unwanted pounds! It also decreases my abdominal bloating. It has not caused any negative effects. I received mine at a discount, but that doesn't affect my review. I recommend it.

I really like these liquid chalk markers, because there's no chalk dust mess to have to  clean up, and I don't get it on my hands! I use them on chalkboard labels, and writing notes to my bf on the bathroom mirror. I have the choice of a bullet or a chisel tip. They are working very well for me. I received them at a discounted price,but that doesn't affect my review. I recommend them.

I purchased Wake Up Sense Progesterone Cream because I have horrible night sweats that wake me up in the middle of the night, and then find it impossible to get back to sleep, which leads to my fatigue and irritability. It a vicious cycle, but thank goodness I made the right decision in buying it, because it has worked miracles for me...no more night sweats! I'm sleeping through the night and have more energy, which makes me a much happier person! How could a cream work this well, I thought to myself, so I did some online research. This is a summary of what I learned: Progesterone is a hormone found in both men and women, and is essential for maintaining good health. A progesterone deficiency can affect our reproductive organs(obviously), but it also affects the functions of our brain, nervous system, heart & circulatory system, immune system, digestive tract, bones, and liver. Some of the signs and symptoms of a deficiency in progesterone are: fatigue, anxiety, nervousness, moodiness, irritability, low sex drive, vaginal dryness, hot flashes, depression, ovarian cysts, endometriosis, weight gain, headaches/migraines, difficulty falling and staying asleep, bloating, chronic constipation, painful breast lumps,and decreased bone density. If you're experiencing any of these, I recommend trying this cream. It's an excellent safe and natural alternative to traditional medicine. I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I love, and recommend it!

This mint flavored liquid spray is formulated with Vitamins D3 and K2. The dosage recommendation is 4 sprays by mouth two times a  day. The size of the container is about the size of a tube of mascara, so  by using it as recommended,(8 sprays in total per day), it definitely won't last very long. On the plus side, it easily fits into my pocket or purse, which is great for me!  As someone with multiple sclerosis, accompanied by a vitamin D deficiency, I have taken vitamin D supplements for years. I prefer the liquid over pill form, because liquid vitamin D enters your system immediately and is fast acting. I did some online research, and this is a summary of what I learned: Vitamin D is a fat soluble vitamin that is produced in our skin in response to sunlight. That's why it's referred to as the Sunshine Vitamin, but with people using sunscreen to decrease the risk of skin cancer, it's necessary to find your daily recommended allowance through food, and vitamin supplements as well. It's found in fortfied milk, egg yolks, salmon, sardines, and shrimp. It's hard to get enough Vitamin D through sun exposure and food alone, so I was very happy to receive this product at a discounted price, which in no way affects my review. As well as being necessary for bone and teeth health which most people already know, Vitamin D also functions to regulate the absorption of calcium and phosphorous, and to facilitate normal immune system function, reducing the risk of developing multiple sclerosis, heart disease, and decreasing the likelihood of catching the flu. Vitamin K2 is also a fat soluble vitamin that helps to maintain bone strength and health, and works to keep arteries clear, in addition to helping calcium travel to bones and teeth. So this little spray packs quite a punch, don't you think?

These are standard size festive, and vibrantly colored  silicone cupcake/muffin cups. They hold 1/3 cup of batter. The silicone cups held up well in the oven, I was able to remove the cooled cupcakes as easily as when I use the paper cupcake liners. I think these will hold up very well with prolonged use. Clean up is super easy by hand washing them in soapy water. I received mine at a discounted price, however that doesn't affect my review. I'm very pleased with this purchase.

These vitamins have a gummy bear shape and are raspberry flavored, along with a children's chewable vitamin taste. So, they definitely don't taste like candy, but they don't taste horrible either, which is a very good thing! Vitamins have 2 categories: water soluble, and fat soluble. Water soluble vitamins are excreted through urine, and are relatively safe if taken in excess of the recommended daily allowance. Fat soluble vitamins are Vitamins A,D,E, and K. Our bodies store fat-soluble vitamins in our fat cells and our liver. It's important not to take excessive doses of fat-soluble vitamin supplements, because they remain stored in our body, and could cause adverse health effects. Being a nurse, I just wanted to remind everyone to always keep these out of your children's reach. OK, back to the product review... They do not contain artificial colors, preservatives, gluten, nuts, eggs, dairy, or soy. What they do contain are the vitamins and minerals our children need, especially these days where both parents work outside of the home, and home cooked meals with fresh vegetables aren't always possible. I received these at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I recommend them!

Wisdom beard oil has a masculine scent of spruce, lemon and cedar that's definitely present. The scent is welcoming, but not overpowering. However, when he's using this beard oil, I asked my boyfriend not to use his cologne, because the two scents do clash. It only takes a dime sized amount that he pours into his palm, then works it into his beard, and he finishes off by using his beard brush to tame it to perfection. His routine leaves him with a sexy healthy shine, and it's so soft that I can't resist gently running my fingers through it! Wisdom Beard Oil is made with olive, grapeseed, apricot, jojoba, and argan oils, vitamin E, and cedar, lemon, and spruce essential oils. That's it- all natural and organic ingredients! Plus it's blended and bottled by hand right here in the good old U.S.A. When he does wear cologne, he uses CanYouHandlebar's Temperance beard oil because it's unscented, and works just as well as the Wisdom beard oil. My boyfriend really loves CanYouHandlebar products. He also has the beard brush, primary and secondary mustache waxes. and wax lifter/picks. We received this beard oil at a discounted price, but that does not affect my review. We love this company's products & courteous service, and highly recommend! CanYouHandlebar followed up via email with some very helpful beard grooming tips after we received my boyfriend's Wisdom Beard Oil. I would like to share them: BeardsStart with a clean (and ideally towel-dry) beard. When applying traditional beard oil or beard dry oil, always be sure to start at the ends of your facial hair and work in towards your face. The ends of the hairs are in need of the most nourishment and using this application method is an easy way to get the most out of your purchase.Take care to ensure your moustache is thoroughly coated as well, brush or comb your beard from the bottom up to work the product through it and then use a brush, comb or your hands to give your beard a shape you will be proud to wear all day.Both the traditional beard oil and beard dry oil can be easily applied with a beard oil brush or with your hands. Make it a point to routinely visit canyouhandlebar.com for more grooming tips, friendly advice, and a fraternity of like-minded individuals.
It protects the screen, but is definitely not air-bubble free as described, despite repeated swipes with the the squeegee that was included.

I hate to leave negative reviews, but after reading all the positive reviews on this iPad case, I purchased it. It did not come with instructions on how to open it, and believe me, it was extremely hard to open! I managed opening it after struggling with it for quite a while. I placed my iPad inside, and  struggled to close it, but it would not close! I spent too much money on my iPad to damage it by trying to "protect" it by trying to force this poorly thought out design closed. I strongly suggest looking for another brand to others!!!

These are really great for cooking, baking, and grilling at temperatures up to 450 degrees. The white polka dots are raised, adding to their safety of use.They're very flexible, ensuring that my small hands have a  very secure grip. They are practical and down right cute! They're also dishwasher safe. I received mine at a discounted price, however that doesn't affect my review. I love, and recommend them!

Fractionated Coconut Oil from Pure Body Naturals Review:  Fractionated Coconut Oil is not like other oils because it's shelf life is indefinite when you store it in a cool dry cabinet. One of the things I love about this colorless, unscented oil is that it produces a protective barrier without irritating my sensitive skin or clogging my pores, and leaves my skin soft, smooth, and hydrated with no greasy feeling. Fractionated Coconut Oil is not like regular coconut oil that goes solid at room temperature although it's ability as an emollient and moisturizer is the same. It stays liquid, is clear, and is great for use in DIY creams, lotions, body & facial scrubs, and other cosmetic recipes for your skin and hair. It absorbs deeply into the skin, making it my very favorite carrier oil for essential oils! This also makes an excellent massage oil carrier base for your essential oils, with my personal favorite being this coconut oil with adding several drops of essential peppermint oil to make my own massage oil for tired, achy muscles. It doesn't stain fabric and it easily washes out of clothing and sheets! If you do a goggle search, you can find so many great DIY(do it yourself) formulas/recipes for fractionated coconut oil. I received mine without charge in exchange for my honest review, which I have definitely given. I love, and recommend this product.

I love the fresh, clean scent of Essential Lemon Oil! I feel refreshed and energized when I use it. You can use it in so many ways: Use it as a skin toner for oily and acne prone skin by diluting it in purified water and spritzing on your face, avoiding your eyes. A word of warning though, when using lemon oil on your skin, avoid exposure to direct sunlight for 12 hours after applying it. It's best to dilute lemon oil with purified water or carrier oils(I dilute mine with fractionated coconut oil). For oily hair, add a few drops to your shampoo, or massage several drops that have been diluted in water into your scalp when you shower. For cold sores, make a lip balm by diluting lemon oil with coconut oil. When used as aromatherapy, it's very beneficial for anxiety, depression, and stress. Add five or six drops in with your vaporizer for colds and respiratory illnesses, And, of course it's great for cleaning your home since it has natural antiseptic and disinfectant properties, especially since the winter season has arrived! This generous sized bottle will last a very long time! I received mine free of charge in exchange for my truthful review, which I have definitely given. I like, and recommend this Essential Lemon Oil!

This lotion does more than moisturize. It restores and nourishes, giving me an even skin tone, and has strengthened my skin's elasticity, making it supple. It's both creamy and light, and absorbs quickly and completely without leaving a tacky or sticky feeling to the surface of my skin. It's made with: Aloe which is very soothing and healing, MSM which helps maintain collagen health, Vitamin C which lightens dark spots and discolorations and also increases collagen production that prevents wrinkle formation, and green tea which helps to prevent collagen and elastin from breaking down. I received mine without charge in exchange for my honest review. I like, and recommend it.

I really like this set! It comes with a roll-up canvas case that holds a total of 36 brushes. There are 12 goat hair brushes for watercolors, 12 boar hair brushes for oils, and 12 nylon brushes for painting with acrylics. These are full size brushes with wood handles, are numbered, and are stained to differentiate the brush types.The brushes are very good quality, and do not shed. Half of the brushes have flat tips and the other half have pointed tips. I'm by no means a professional artist, but I'm not a beginner either. I paint as a hobby, and this set serves me well for that purpose! As far as cleaning the brushes, they are very easy to clean and hold up well! I received mine at a discounted price, however that doesn't affect my review. I like, and recommend this set.

The right tools make all the difference, and I've found not the right tools, but the PERFECT tools with this amazing makeup brush set! They give my makeup an HD finish!!! The set includes a powder brush for powder(naturally!) and mineral makeup, an angled blush brush for bronzer/blush cheek application, a foundation brush for liquid and cream foundation application, a concealer brush for blemishes and dark circles, a large and small eye-shadow brush, and an angled eyebrow brush. The synthetic bristles on these brushes are unbelievably soft, and pick up the product extremely well without leaching my product into the brushes. Instead, my product is evenly applied on my skin, leaving me with a flawless, airbrushed appearance! I received mine at a discounted price, but that does not affect my review. This set comes with a 100% lifetime money-back guarantee. I love risk-free purchases!

I got this for my granddaughter for use with her iPod. I love that it has a LED display that shows you how much power is remaining. Recharging it is as easy as plugging it into your computer or a USB wall charger. By using this charger, her iPod gets a full charge. This is a powerful little charger, and exceeded my expectations! It arrived fully charged!!! I received this at a discounted price, however that does not affect my review. I like, and recommend it.

This has a pivoting head and a the handle is very comfortable to hold. It does an excellent job of ridding my cat, Annie, of her loose fur, and she really seems to enjoy me using it to groom her. In fact, she comes running to me when she sees me getting it out! We're purr-fectly happy with this purchase. I received it at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I like, and recommend it!

I use this serum every morning and night; applying along my upper lash lines and my eyebrows by using the applicator brush. I allow it to dry before applying my skincare products. I'm beginning to notice new growth in my brows, something I thought to be impossible, because I plucked them for so many years! I've noticed less improvement with my eyelashes than my eyebrows, however there is still some improvement. They are a little thicker, and a tiny bit longer. This serum has not caused redness, itching, burning or irritation to my sensitive skin or eyes, I love the fact that this serum is made in the U.S.A. and is not tested on animals. I received mine at a discounted price, but that has not influenced my review. I like, and recommend Radiant Complex Lash & Brow Serum.

With the weather being -2 degrees here in Ohio, I received this amazing set at the perfect time! It protects my skin from the frigid temperature and wind. It's a lifesaver, and I recommend it!!! I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review.

The PEANUTS Snoopy Hot Dog & Bun Toaster is good quality, and user friendly- it is very simple to operate! It can toast 2 hot dogs and 2 buns at the same time. Simply choose one of the 5 settings, place your dogs and buns in it, and push the lever down. It pops up like a standard  toaster when the toasting has completed. My 10 year old granddaughter uses it with absolutely no problem! It heats a lunch that kids will love.I love the appearance of it..a cheery bright red with Snoopy & his doghouse on the side. I catch myself myself smiling every time I look at it! It has a removable crumb tray, making clean-up a breeze. I am extremely pleased with my purchase, and recommend it!!!

These are very good markers.They are really simple to use- as simple as using a pen, but the finished appearance looks just like chalk! I use them on chalkboard labels. Once the marker paint is dry, it's basically smudge-proof. The marker paint can be removed from the chalkboard labels simply by wiping it off with a damp cloth if you want to write something else on the labels. They're safe for (age appropriate) children to use since they are water based and non-toxic.I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I like, and recommend them!

I've never used a skincare product that contains some of these ingredients, one being gotu kola. Gotu kola  stimulates collagen production, which preserves, restores, and hydrates skin. Horsetail is another ingredient that I was unfamiliar with. It's high in silica, which enhances collagen production as well. So basically, those two ingredients work to  improve my skin's elasticity. Wild geranium works to distribute melanin evenly in the skin which gives my skin an even color. Dandelion is rich is anti oxidants, especially vitamin-C to lighten discoloration. This moisturizer absorbs completely into my dry and sensitive skin, leaving it soft, smooth, supple, and radiant. I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I like, and recommend it.

The Amazon listing reads: Designed specifically for the modern warrior who needs to change at a moments notice. Prepare for another day of crushing victories...Well, you'll have to battle this warrior princess over this absolutely amazing shampoo and conditioner! Yes, I'm a woman, and I use both the shampoo, and conditioner. They have a wonderful peppermint scent that lingers for hours. It's not an overpowering scent, just a mildly pleasant scent that causes my boyfriend to hug me a little longer than before I started using it, followed by complimenting me on how great I smell! I would share my shampoo and conditioner with him, but the longer hugs and compliments may cease. I will never admit to him these products I'm using are advertised for men. I will admit, I bought my ex-boyfriend a bottle of the shampoo a while back, When we split up, he left the shampoo behind. I ran out of my shampoo, and used the bottle he left behind. Now I'm hooked! I have long hair that's color-processed, and the combination of the shampoo and conditioner has made it much softer, silkier, and shiny. I've gotten so many compliments since I've started using it. Needless to say, I love and recommend it! I received both at a discounted price, but that definitely doesn't affect my review.

Recently I spent some time researching peppermint oil online. I knew it was beneficial for asthma, which is what I normally use it for, by adding drops of it into sterile water in my vaporizer. But, I was amazed at the many other benefits it offers! It is useful in the treatment of arthritic pain, bronchitis, cold sores, congestion, fever, foot soaks, flu, halitosis (bad breath), headaches, herpes, hives, itching, lice, motion sickness, muscle aches, and sinusitis. It is also used in aromatherapy to soothe the mind and body. Another use is pest control for ants, bedbugs, fleas, tics, flies, mosquitoes, roaches, rodents, and spiders. I found this information by doing a google search, typing in: benefits of peppermint oil. Since this is therapeutic grade, not food grade, I will not be using it internally. Also, I will not be applying it by itself on my skin. It is an essential oil, meaning it is highly concentrated and should never be put on the skin without mixing it with a carrier oil. I combine a few drops to Fractionated Coconut Oil for use as a massage oil which is great for my arthritic pain!. As I stated earlier. I use it in my vaporizer, and it works amazingly well. So well, in fact, that I rarely use my rescue inhaler. This huge 4 ounce bottle will last a long time! I received mine at a discounted price, however that does not affect my review. I recommend this product.

VA has a good quality aluminium herb grinder with it's friction-free operation. It grinds very smoothly and evenly, having extremely sharp cutting blades. It grinds consistently giving you fluffy herbs with every use. It has enough room to hold a lot of herbs because it has deep reservoirs that collect the herb and pollen. It has a stainless steel mesh screen that filters the finest pollen to the bottom.  Magnets help to keep it closed tightly to maintain freshness and control odor.  VA herb grinder will be the last one I ever own. With a lifetime guarantee you can't go wrong if you decide to purchase one. I received mine at a discounted price, however that does not affect my review. I recommend it.

I bought this pencil set as a gift for my 10 yr.old granddaughter. She absolutely loves art, as well as crafts, so this was a perfect gift for her. The set comes with everything you need other than a sketch book. It includes charcoal pencils, sharpeners, erasers, graphite sticks, and charcoal sticks in the manufacturer's packaging which can be used as a reusable plastic case. The supplies included are great quality, in fact, I was shocked at the quality because they are priced so low! I would definitely recommend this to anyone- from the beginner like my granddaughter to the expert artist- anyone who has an interest in drawing! I  purchased mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review.

I read several reviews after purchasing this item that the bags are not Hoover brand, but are generic. I received GENUINE  Hoover brand bags, and am pleased with my purchase. I would purchase from this seller again.

Abundant Living's Natural Diatomaceous Earth Powder is a safe, non-toxic product that will not harm humans, animals, or birds. Our family uses it on our pets for flea prevention, and it works amazingly well because we have never had a flea problem. It can also be used it to absorb moisture and odors, spills in cars, oil on driveways, wet pet bedding, and litter boxes. While it's completely safe for our family and pets, it's also an excellent insecticide for cockroaches, bedbugs, and other unwanted insects, acting as glass shards cutting under insect's exoskeltons and dehydrating them. I received mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I recommend it for flea prevention, which is what we use it for.

I purchased my Chalkola Liquid Chalk Markers at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I love the bold and vibrant color selection in this set, not to mention they have bullet point tips that don't dry out or crack! They are great for drawing and decorating mirrors, windows, dry erase boards, vinyl chalkboard labels(which is what I'm currently using them for), school, craft, and scrapbook projects,and decorative organizing in your home! Once completely dry they leave a paint-like, smudge-proof finish. But they wipe away easily and completely with a damp cloth on non-porous surfaces, making clean up a breeze. These are great for both children and adults! I am very pleased with my purchase, and recommend them to others!

I love these! I just fill the molds, let them freeze, then pop them out of the molds, and I have jumbo sized ice ball spheres. The spheres stay frozen much longer than cubes, so they don't melt & water down my drinks before I have a chance to finish them! I can't wait for strawberries to come back in season so I can place one into each ice mold. Not only will the drinks I serve stay cold, but will look very unique as well! I'll be the "cool" hostess with strawberry balls! O.K. about the details:They're dishwasher safe. They are FDA approved, and made of food grade premium silicone. They have a lifetime guarantee. I bought mine at a discounted price, but that doesn't affect my review. I recommend them.

This vest is wonderfully unique, and I really loved the details - there is a little gold bell attached to each bear's bow tie and it jingles. There's a lot to the design, but it doesn't seem too busy (and doesn't make me feel dizzy). In addition to being beautiful, it's thick and feels solid, not like it will fall apart after one day of wear. I wasn't sure what size to choose, so I went up a size and am glad I did - the vest doesn't necessarily seem to be made on the small side, but I like the longer length of a size bigger, and there's a little more room to move around, especially considering the top I'll wear underneath. If you like your vests snug and not at all loose, the size top you usually wear should work fine.I mainly bought this sweater vest because I wanted something dressier to wear to work, and this is exactly what I wanted. I'm very happy with it.

"Anna and the Swallow Man" is a haunting story told in such beautiful, lyrical language - it felt like I was reading a work of art that possessed a lot of heart and soul. There was a depth to this children's story I found surprising, as well - it's a thoughtful book that explores the horror, terror, hunger, violence and death of war with just enough hope, songs, sweet surprises and questions with interesting answers that readers don't feel crushed under the heaviness of the constant struggle to survive.Anna is 7 when her father leaves for a meeting at work and never returns. She meets a man who helps her overcome her fear by sharing his special language with the swallows. In Anna's eyes, the man resembles King Solomon. But the tall, thin, wise man who speaks not only Bird, but countless other languages as well (just like her father, and she too can speak many of the languages) convinces Anna to compromise and call him the Swallow Man or Daddy.The Swallow Man teaches Anna the language of Road, and the two walk the Polish (and briefly, Soviet) roads,towns and through the woods, and then they walk more, in their quest to survive. Through the years, Anna (who gives her name to the Swallow Man in exchange for the name Sweetie) asks questions, the Swallow Man answers, and the two develop a family and bond that isn't easily broken. Anna isn't the only one capable of learning lessons from the Swallow Man, as is evidenced when Anna makes a new friend. Sometimes it's difficult to endure something you don't like or approve of to please someone else, but it's an unspoken lesson that was told beautifully, with some humor and hope mixed in with the hardships.Death, illness and tragedy are dealt with realistically and compassionately; there are no pat, easy answers and sometimes Anna, her friend, or the Swallow Man's anguish are keen and deeply felt - it's part of what made the book more treasure-worthy, the wide range of honest and frequently bold or raw emotions. The only part of the story I struggled a bit to understand was the ending. But after thinking about it, I did finally comprehend and make some sense of it - I just didn't particularly like it. The ending fit in well with the Swallow Man's personality and Road lessons (one of which involves the importance of questions and the ability to keep asking them). I really wanted a few less questions, though (or just a few more answers!) and a bit more satisfaction in the end, but hey, life, in this case Anna's and the Swallow Man's, often is not like that.

I loved "Warren the 13th and the All-Seeing Eye" - more than I anticipated I would. The story is warm and charming, yet really quite smart (there are many good concepts to contemplate - such as family legacies and tradition; what the phrases "love is blind" and "don't judge a book by its cover" mean). The book would be fun to use when discussing fairy tales (are there others, such as Cinderella, that Warren reminds a reader of? How are the characters the same? How are they different?) I found myself guessing and making predictions about what might happen next (I was usually wrong, but it was still fun). There's also some interesting vocabulary, such as "menaced," "confers," "betrayal" - it didn't feel as though young readers were being talked "down" to and that was pretty cool. Warren comes across as smart, as well as hard-working, adventurous and friendly.There is some fine humor and some very mysterious, curious, quirky characters in this book, and I thought the cast really worked well together with a well-paced, interesting plot, to produce an engaging story. The art is truly amazing and eye-grabbing, as well - not to give away the exact details of the illustrations, but the colors used are perfect. Warren is one of those rare characters with a story that drew me in so well that I'd love to stay at his hotel - can't wait to visit him again in the next book!

These Hershey-Ets tasted good and fresh - for a little piece of candy, I liked the punch of the big chocolate taste and the crunchy candy coating. The tin isn't elaborate or fancy, but I liked it well enough because it seals tightly and serves its purpose well, which is protecting the Ets and helping ensure the candy stays fresh. There is a thick white plastic liner in the tin as added protection. When I first opened the tin, all I could see were smooth-looking, whole red and green Ets - there were very few pieces that were broken or chipped, and those were at the bottom, which is understandable. I would love to receive this as a gift; I also wouldn't hesitate to purchase it for friends, co-workers and family members who have a sweet tooth and appreciate quality chocolate.

Eliana is the only female private investigator in the domed Hope City, Antarctica. She's good at her job, and she hopes to earn enough for a ticket out of the dome and into the mainland, even if that means leaving her boyfriend, Diego, who's an errand runner for Ignacio Cabrera, the city's crime boss. When Lady Luna, a beautiful and wealthy aristocrat, comes to Eliana with an unusual assignment, earning a big chunk of money toward her escape is the biggest motivator for Eliana to accept the job, which turns out to be more dangerous than she imagined.While Eliana completes her mission for Lady Luna (who prefers to be called Marianella), a friendship develops between the two women. Eliana learns secrets about Marianella she must decide whether she can keep; meanwhile, Marianella is trying to unravel a mystery involving her dangerous friend, Sofia, and what exactly she's doing in the abandoned amusement park with maintenance drones, and robots such as android Luciano, who's been programmed to help people but still manages to think for himself and go against orders from time to time.Elaina's life crumbles when she discovers Diego's betrayal; but can she still save his life? The book moves along at a smooth, interesting pace. Each character mostly has a distinct personality, with an interesting blend or balance between good and evil. However, Cabrera is not deeply drawn and feels like a somewhat dull, stereotypical villain. Although the action is fairly original and fast-paced, some of the reactions were repeated so many times they became monotonous and lost their appeal. Overall, it felt like a good effort to tell an unusual story about what it means to be human in a world where those humans who appear to be friends may not be, and where robots might have more in their programs than blindly following humankind's orders. The big question is, as the humans and robots each work toward their own different ideas of freedom and success, is there a way for them to work together, or are they ultimately rivals?

I like more than the appearance of this design, which is a bit unique, simple yet eye-catching; I like the way it's molded into a barely perceptible half-sphere - this seems to keep the necklace from constantly flipping over from front to back. The round knotted design isn't heavy, yet it's solid and doesn't fly around when you're moving or working, which I liked.The only thing I immediately wasn't sure about was the chain. It's very, very thin, and I was afraid it would break easily. The clasp is nice, solid and easy to use. I did note after wearing it awhile that the chain seemed stronger than it looks - and the clasp didn't move around to get caught next to the designed part, which I liked. Overall, it's a nice necklace I feel comfortable wearing both for casual outings and for work.

I have another Downton Abbey necklace/earring set and really, really liked it, so I bought this one, too, wanting to expand my collection. I have to admit, when I first opened the box, I was a little disappointed. The product picture is a little misleading, probably because it's enlarged to show the details and it does look sparklier in the picture than it looks in the box. The blue stone, especially, just looks dull (in the earrings especially). But when I took the necklace out of the box, I liked it more. After wearing it, I like it much, much better (it feels solid yet comfortable, with a good clasp and weight overall, and I love how it's designed because the flower is fixed in place and doesn't move around - you don't have that annoying clasp that moves until it's in the front right next to the flower).The earrings also looked much nicer in my ears than in the box. Nice enough for work or casual wear, anyway.I would suggest giving this set a try and wearing it even if at first glance you feel kind of "meh." It's worth it.

Mitch Albom has a flair for writing warm, personal stories that have a freshness and depth to them. "The Magic Strings of Frankie Presto" is no exception. Readers don't need to have an affection for or a deep interest in music to see and feel the connections in this book, but it probably adds a bit of spark if there's some kind of appreciation for music.This story tells Frankie's life and the impact it had on people close to him, and those who were at a distance. Not only does the story explore the importance and magic of music, it wraps up a deep and abiding love which isn't perfect but doesn't pretend or assume it is, in music's embrace, as well. Every aspect, positive or negative, triumph or defeat, is somehow connected to the music in Frankie's soul. Music is one of the narrators of Frankie's life story, as a matter of fact.Many people tell Frankie's story - from a variety of musicians (most that people will recognize), to Music, to an unknown narrator who fills in some blanks in Frankie's timeline. Usually, the story flows well and the change in narrators is fluid and easy to follow. Once, somewhere in the middle of Frankie's story, I stumbled a little with a time change, but quickly caught up with where I should be.I enjoyed this uplifting story about how a boy grows into a man and discovers he possesses magic guitar strings and finally realizes what those magic strings mean. It was a fun yet fulfilling story that gave me plenty to think (and feel) about without being preachy or over-done.

My husband was impressed with this knife and began carrying it immediately. When I asked him why he liked it, he listed the following positives about this knife:* It's mega-thin, lightweight and fits in his hand well. It's good for everyday use (and being so thin, it's not bulky to carry in a pocket).* Even though it's small, the knife opens into a nice-sized blade.* It has a unique, boxy look.* The liner lock and the blade were sturdy.* The knife opened and closed easily - there was a little stiffness because the knife is new, but with use, it should become smoother.* There's a lanyard hole.* The thumb hole is spacious and long.Overall, this knife is a prized addition to my husband's knife collection. He said he wouldn't hesitate to recommend it for gift-giving and would buy another one.

Unfortunately, I am one of those people who's always cold - summer (in the air conditioning) as well as winter. So, I have had quite a few different heaters, even taking one to work when I was permitted. This little Vornado is not only attractive and very easy to move (light-weight) and transport (compact), it's easy to use. It does exactly what it's supposed to do (heat a room), and it does this quietly.Although the heat coming out isn't forceful (you can't feel it across the room), you can feel a noticeable difference in the warmth of the room you're heating when you come in from another room. I also can sit very close to it and enjoy the warmth without feeling stifled. My husband is the opposite of me and very rarely cold, but he likes to use the Vornado on cold evenings - just on his feet. He likes being able to move it easily so he can control where he wants the warm air to go - since it's not forceful air, people who aren't as chilled all the time can still enjoy it in smaller doses and aimed in a particular direction without feeling overheated. I've used the Vornado in my library (the size of a bedroom) and my bedroom, and within 10 minutes, the chill is gone from the room and I can feel warmth coming out into the hallway. The Vornado is so quiet you forget it's there.There are four buttons on the Vornado - a power button, a hot./fan air button, and a + and a - for up and down in the temperature. If the heater tips, it shuts off automatically, and there's a countdown of 8 seconds when you turn it off until it powers down. The Vornado is a great addition to our household and I wouldn't hesitate to buy it as a gift for loved ones seeking a reliable, easy-to-use and very quiet room heater.

I actually very much like the heaviness (makes me think of solid and dependable) and the feel of this watch, and it's a gorgeous, high-quality watch. While I don't mind the oversize aspect of the watch, I have a tiny wrist, so this watch slipped right off and there is no adjustment in the band at all. I wanted to wear it immediately, and have always taken my own links out of watches in the past, but this wasn't an option for this watch. There were no instructions for removing links in the enclosed booklet, which really isn't a big deal with the easy access to the internet to mine for information. My husband, who is excellent at fixing almost anything, knew how to remove the links and has amassed a large collection of tools over the years. But he didn't own a small enough tool to remove the links - though he tried repeatedly with a variety of smaller tools he did have. After shattering a needle from my sewing kit, he finally gave up.
